data.title: Duane Allen Wold
data.meta_description: Duane A. Wold, age 87, of Richfield.
data.text: Duane Wold, age 87, of Richfield MN, passed away Wednesday, May 26, 2021. Formerly of Dawson, MN, he married Shirley Wold (Magstadt) in 1963. Duane served in the Army. He attended University of St Cloud State University where he received his Masters Degree in Education. He started his teaching career at Kimball, MN from 1957-1959. He then moved to Richfield where he taught from 1959-1993. He started his coaching career in Kimball as an assistant coach with his brother. He coached cross-country, basketball, track and taught driverâ€™s education. His last driving student was his grandson Jack. After retirement, he worked part-time at P&L Automotive worked for 20 years and volunteered at VEAP. He is proceeded in death by parents Einar and Leona Wold, and sister Virginia Schumacher (Wold). He is survived by his wife Shirley, sons Scott (Lisa), Lee (Susan); grandchildren, Jacob, Jack, and Carter. Twin brother Darold (Naomi) and many nephews, nieces, cousins, best friend Donald Olson of 80 years, and friends. Special thank you to the staff at Village Shores and Lifesprk Hospice. The family will have a private ceremony at Ft Snelling Cemetery.
